metadata.title: CVE-2023-6610 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability was found in smb2_dump_detail infs/smb/client/smb2ops.c in the Linux Kernel. This issue could allow a localattacker to crash the system or leak internal kernel information.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-7.7').
linux-aws package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
